mapper.select: SELECT RECENT_LOC_NO, ZIPCD, ADDRS, DTL_ADDRS FROM ( SELECT RECENT_LOC_NO, ZIPCD, ADDRS, DTL_ADDRS, ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY REGST_DATE DESC ) AS RNUM FROM RECENT_LOC WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{member_no} ) WHERE RNUM <= 3
mapper.update: UPDATE RECENT_LOC SET REGST_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE RECENT_LOC_NO = #{recent_loc_no}
